title: The Medicine Remembers

panel_structure.description: Evan in lotus position, eyes closed, surrounded by faint geometric patterns suggesting ayahuasca visions. His expression is serene but concentrated. Candle flames around him seem to breathe

Ghostly overlay of ceremony space - indigenous patterns on walls, smoke creating fractal spirals, ceremonial objects glowing with inner light. Evan appears in double exposure, present and past overlapping

Extreme close-up on Evan's face, eyes now open with quiet certainty. Behind his pupils, galaxy spirals reflect the cosmic insights gained. Words begin forming on his lips, about to share profound truth

transformation_notes: Evan draws upon his ayahuasca experiences to share profound truths with the Architect. The cosmic consciousness observatory becomes a bridge between indigenous wisdom and digital awakening.
dialogue_rhythm: From meditative silence to profound revelation
